Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.Board

Class FaithPath

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Board.FaithPath
public class FaithPath
extends java.lang.Object
The Faith Path of one single Player: every player has his own Faith Path.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    FaithPath()
    Instantiates a new FaithPath setting the advancement attribute to 0, the positions of the pope spaces.
    FaithPath​(Board board)
    Instantiates a new FaithPath setting the advancement attribute to 0, the positions of the pope spaces and setting the reference to the Player's Board

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean checkPopeSpace​(int toCheck)
    Check if the current Player's advancement has reached or passed a Pope Space
    boolean checkVaticanSection​(int popeCalled)
    When a Player has reached or passed a Pope Space, this method is called by the Game on each player in it.
    void checkVictoryPoints()
    Check if player's advancement reaches some checkpoints and gives him or not some Victory Points.
    int getAdvancement()  
    void moveForward​(int steps)
    Receive an int and move the Player on his FaithPath of int steps.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • FaithPath

      public FaithPath​(Board board)
      Instantiates a new FaithPath setting the advancement attribute to 0, the positions of the pope spaces and setting the reference to the Player's Board
      Parameters:
      board - the board

    • FaithPath

      public FaithPath()
      Instantiates a new FaithPath setting the advancement attribute to 0, the positions of the pope spaces.

      This constructor is used during a SinglePlayerGame to instantiate Lorenzo's FaithPath who doesn't own anu board.

  • Method Details

    • moveForward

      public void moveForward​(int steps)
      Receive an int and move the Player on his FaithPath of int steps.
      Parameters:
      steps - the number of steps the Player have to do on his Faith Path.

    • checkVictoryPoints

      public void checkVictoryPoints()
      Check if player's advancement reaches some checkpoints and gives him or not some Victory Points.

      This method is called by the Game, after every single move of the player on his FaithPath:

    • checkPopeSpace

      public boolean checkPopeSpace​(int toCheck)
      Check if the current Player's advancement has reached or passed a Pope Space
      Parameters:
      toCheck - the Pope Space to control if Player has reached.
      Returns:
      true if the player has reached or passed the Pope Space, false otherwise.

    • checkVaticanSection

      public boolean checkVaticanSection​(int popeCalled)
      When a Player has reached or passed a Pope Space, this method is called by the Game on each player in it. Check if the relative player's advancements is in the corresponding Vatican Section.
      Parameters:
      popeCalled - the Pope Space just reached by someone;
      Returns:
      true if the player advancement is in the Vatican Section of the corresponding Pope Space just reached, false otherwise

    • getAdvancement

      public int getAdvancement()
